       <div id="wrapbox10506281">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10506281">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10506281">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10506281">
          <div id="boxatt10506281" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492391">
              <a id="link_25492391" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/filmstudiessem" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492391,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25492391});">
               CUE: Film Studies Seminar
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12766306">
              <a id="link_12766306" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/filmhistoryone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12766306,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766306});">
               Film History I
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12766309">
              <a id="link_12766309" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/filmhistorytwo" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12766309,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766309});">
               Film History II
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>

        </div>

       <div id="wrapbox10699721">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10699721">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10699721">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10506080">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10506080">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10506080">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10506080">
          <div id="boxatt10506080" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12766292">
              <a id="link_12766292" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12766292,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766292}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23458843">
              <a id="link_23458843" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23458843,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23458843}); ">
               Film &amp; Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library. Full text includes Cinema Journal, Film &amp; History, Film Comment, Film Criticism, Film History, Film International, Film Journal International, Journal of Film and Video, and Journal of Popular Film and Television.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12766128">
              <a id="link_12766128" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12766128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766128}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of approximately 15 scholarly film studies journals, all full text. In most cases, the last 3-5 years are not included in the archive. Full text journals include Cinema Journal, Film History, Film Quarterly, and Journal of Film and Video,
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12766286">
              <a id="link_12766286" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12766286,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10506081">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10506081">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10506081">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Film Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10506081">
          <div id="boxatt10506081" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23464777">
              <a id="link_23464777" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23464777,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23464777}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Film reviews 1980-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23464799">
              Film Review Index
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to film reviews from 1882-1985. Call #016.79143 F487r
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23464802">
              <a id="link_23464802" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23464802,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23464802}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reviews from newspapers (national and local) around the globe, 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23465232">
              <a id="link_23465232" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/34107580" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23465232,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23465232}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Film reviews from the time the NYT started review films, to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23465240">
              <a id="link_23465240" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23465240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23465240}); ">
               OmniFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes the Reader's Guide, with film reviews from1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23465255">
              <a id="link_23465255" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23465255,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film Studies', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23465255}); ">
               Readers' Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Film reviews in popular periodicals, 1920s-1980.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

           <td>

             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" title="View Profile">
              <img alt="Profile Image" border="0" src="//lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/profiles/63914/kelly_2_feb_2013.jpg" class="profile_image_align profileimage" style="max-width:140px;" />

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon

            <div class="profileh4">

              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" id="profile_link">
               Profile &amp; Guides
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Subjects:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/cat.php?search_cat=Humanities+and+Business&amp;mode=profile_search">
               Humanities and Business
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       &nbsp;
